Question: In September 1984, this person was first informed about the sale by Branca and sent a bid of $46 million on November 20, 1984.
Hints: Responding to the gossip, this person remarked to Taraborrelli:.
This person had expected the licenses to the masters of his albums to revert to him sometime in the early 2000s.
In 1986, "We Are the World" won four Grammys (one for this person for Song of the Year).
